member.name: T:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider
member.summary: Provider for JetBrains InspectCode.exe (Resharper Command Line). Get the number of violations from a specified solution. Expects metadatas: - InspectCodePath: FullPathToInspectCode - DotSettingsFile: Path to DotSettingsFile - TempDir: Directory to output .metrics.xml files

member.name: M:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider.GetMetrics
member.summary: Get available metrics for this provider

member.name: M:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider.AddMetadata(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Invoked from core on providers to set properties sent from MSBuild engine.

member.name: M:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider.#ctor(MSBuildCodeMetrics.Core.IFileStreamFactory)
member.summary: Constructor used in tests for mocking IFileStreamFactory

member.name: M:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider.ComputeMetrics(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Computes de metrics. Executes the InspectCode executable and parses xml response.

member.name: P:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of this provider

member.name: P:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider.Logger
member.summary: Used by core to inject logger to provider

member.name: P:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.InspectCodeProvider.ProcessExecutor
member.summary: Used by core to inject process executor to provider

member.name: T:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.XML.InspectCodeReport
member.summary: Class for XML serialization of InspectCode output

member.name: M:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.XML.InspectCodeReport.Deserialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes a stream, expecting a InspectCode output file in the stream

member.name: T:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.XML.Issue
member.summary: Represents one violation of resharper rules

member.name: P:MSBuildCodeMetrics.JetBrains.XML.Issue.TypeId
member.summary: Id of the violation. Can be referenced with Id on IssueType to find severity

member.summary: List of issues of this project
